column1: #Text=The inside seems to be completely intact .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That fox thingy went in through a window .
#Text=I say we climb up there and give it a look .
#Text=" Toph says : " I say you guys go ahead without me .
#Text=" Katara says : " You got something against libraries ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I 've held books before .
#Text=And I got ta tell you , they do n't exactly do it for me .
#Text=" Toph says : " Let me know if they have something you can listen to .
